name: The Phoenix
description:
The Phoenix is a classic 2D action-platformer. This game is inspired by Capcom's Mega Man games from the late 1980s and early 1990s, with 8-bit art, a soundtrack inspired by chiptune music, and simple yet challenging gameplay.

Play as the Phoenix as you traverse 5 difficult levels, fight through hordes of henchmen, and fight powerful supervillains in an attempt to save the city from an evil mob boss!
